title: Is it really worth studying law in the UK? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Madhav, thanks for the A2A. Well, that really depends on what you want to do after you finish your studies, or what your own, personal motivations are. The UK has some fantastic universities, and demanding courses. But again, the first question to answer is what you want to get out of your studies. All the best. Anuj

I've been doing some research on this with my daughter as she's about to do a law degree. The concensus seems to be that uk law degrees will continue to be in demand in all the anglophone countries, but with AI developing and us leaving the EU you better be prepared to specialise in something niche to be employable.
